title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Shooting in San Jose. Biden WH shut down State Department probe of covid leak from Wuhan lab. Rush outlined all the coronavirus taboo subjects that Biden is now trying to cover up. Rand Paul receives threatening package. Biden invites George Floyd family to WH to celebrate BLM. Democrats benefit from racial strife, BLM movement, undermining of cops. Portland riots. Rush on the Democrat BLM war on cops. Rush called it the real War on Women: Democrats allow chaos, sex trafficking at the border.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Marco Rubio echoes Rush, sounds the alarm on critical race theory. Rush on the 1619 Project. AOC says she's going to therapy over January 6th. DOJ seizes $90,000 from leftist agitator John Sullivan, who infiltrated, egged on Capitol Riot. Rush exposed Sullivan from the beginning. Shooting in San Jose. Biden administration relocating illegals all over the country. Maryland caller on illegals flooding into communities.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

John Cena grovels to ChiComs after referring to Taiwan as a country. Rush on Nike and the NBA caving to the ChiComs after Houston Rockets exec tweeted in support of Hong Kong. Caller outraged by Biden's ceremony with the Floyd family at the WH. Biden resumes Obama's assault on the coal industry. Group of teens found patriotic small business: "Flying Old Glory", kids like this are the reason Rush started the Rush Revere Series. Rush and Kathryn donated 30,000 books to local schools and libraries.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
